item.title: Quick reference for Data Analysis with Python
item.description: Quick reference for Data Analysis with Python This post is to reference to help those that are familiar with data analysis using python in Jupyter Notebook / Jupyter Lab. If you don’t have jupyter notebooks set up you will want to find another tutorial on how to install it and learn the basics of how to use it. Tutorials and references I’ve found helpful is the Data analysis with python content on Freecodecamp , and Data analysis in python on Youtube Corey Schafer on youtube .
